title: LOL all these complaints about sever DCing
body: I have not had a server error since early season 4 so idk what you're all complaining about i play with 4 others quite regularly and they have no issues so just stop complaining or get better internet/computers

replies.body:
In the past two days Riot has had two different technical issues, both affecting player's abilities to connect to the game. 
The issues were not the fault of the players and could not be solved by better computers/internet.
Riot have responded to the issues in 2 posts now, both available on the front page.

This is all correct info - for more details on the issues in question, check out [this retrospective post](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XHGFrU9j-follow-up-on-connection-issues-5032015).
